countries.name: Japan
countries.description: Japan blends ancient traditions with cutting-edge technology. From Tokyo's neon streets to Kyoto's serene temples, discover a unique culture, exquisite cuisine, and four distinct seasons.

countries.name: Italy
countries.description: Italy offers art, history, and la dolce vita. Explore Rome's ruins, Florence's Renaissance, Venice's canals, and world-renowned cuisine from the Alps to Sicily.

temples.name: Angkor Wat
temples.description: Angkor Wat in Cambodia is the world's largest religious monument. This 12th-century temple complex is a masterpiece of Khmer architecture and a UNESCO World Heritage site.

temples.name: Borobudur
temples.description: Borobudur in Indonesia is a stunning 9th-century Buddhist temple. The massive stupa features hundreds of relief panels and Buddha statues amid lush Java scenery.

beaches.name: Santorini
beaches.description: Santorini's volcanic beaches and white villages offer iconic Greek island beauty. Red and black sand beaches, caldera views, and sunset dining make it unforgettable.

beaches.name: Maldives
beaches.description: The Maldives is paradise with crystal-clear lagoons, overwater bungalows, and pristine coral reefs. Ideal for diving, snorkeling, and pure relaxation.
